title: Starting Over
description: For Mature Adult Audiences. Contains language and actions some may deem offensive. Sexually explicit content. Violence. Ménage – MFM.In book three of Lucifer’s Wolfman has made enemies, and now it’s payback time. Starting completely over may have been unexpected but the change is good, and a necessity for the wellbeing of the Breed.All the while River wants to avenge her brother's death, regardless of the collateral damage that must happen.When tempers flare and enemies step forward—will the Breed come out on top—and if so, at what cost.
author: Ryder Dane
